definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: Overflow from the pool lubricates the gear and returns oil to the reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 來自所述池的溢流潤滑齒輪並使油返回貯存器。

sentences.english: The bones serve as a calcium storage tank for the body to draw on.
sentences.chinese: 骨充當着鈣的貯存器，以供機體來提取利用。
